Waypoint.action:
MainBP = "beach backpack" LootBP = "purple backpack" MiscBPID = 2869 --- blue backpack (food, rope, shovel etc.) LootBPID = 2868 --- purple backpack
FLOOR = "-1" --- ("-1" or "-2" or "Both")
CapToLeave = 100 MPToLeave = 300 HPToLeave = 20
MPId = 237 --- strong mana potion MPToBuy = 1500 HPId = 23375 --- supreme health potion HPToBuy = 100
Waypoint.label: CONFIG

Waypoint.action:
local mainBpItem = getinventory(INVENTORY_BACKPACK)
reopenbps({mainBpItem.id, "back"}, {LootBPID, MainBP, true}) wait(1000) opendepot("depot") waitping() deposititems(LootBP, 1, 2) waitping() closecontainers() waitping() reopenbps({mainBpItem.id, "back"}, { LootBPID, MainBP, true}, { MiscBPID, MainBP, true})
Waypoint.label: DEPOSITER

Waypoint.action: talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_SAY, "hi") waitping() talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "deposit all") waitping() talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "yes") waitping()
Waypoint.label: BANK

Waypoint.action: talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_SAY, "hi") waitping() talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "trade") waitping() talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "potions") waitping() sellobject(285,countitems(285)) waitping() sellobject(284,countitems(284)) waitping() sellobject(283,countitems(283)) waitping() buyitemsupto(MPId, MPToBuy) waitping() buyitemsupto(HPId, HPToBuy)
Waypoint.label: MANASHOP

Waypoint.action: if (countitems(MPId) < MPToLeave) or (countitems(HPId) < HPToLeave) or (cap() < CapToLeave) then gotolabel("START") else gotolabel("GOHUNT") end
Waypoint.label: CHECK

Waypoint.action: reachnpc("Captain Sinbeard") wait(500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_SAY, "hi") waitping() talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "venore") waitping() talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "yes") waitping()
Waypoint.label: TOVENORE

Waypoint.action: if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("#016") end
local position = Position:new(posx(), posy()-1, posz()) usedoor(position, "open")
Waypoint.label: OPEN1

Waypoint.action: local position = Position:new(posx()-1, posy(), posz()) usedoor(position, "open") move("w")
Waypoint.label: OPEN2

Waypoint.action: reachnpc("Eustacio") wait(500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_SAY, "hi") waitping() talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "shortcut") waitping() talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "yes") waitping()
Waypoint.label: TRAVEL

Waypoint.action: if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("#024") end
if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("#029") end
Waypoint.label: LocCheck3

Waypoint.action: if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("#032") end
Waypoint.label: LocCheck4

Waypoint.action: reachnpc("Captain Jack Rat") wait(500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_SAY, "hi") waitping() talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "sail") waitping() talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "safe") waitping() talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "yes") waitping()
Waypoint.label: Travel

Waypoint.action: if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("Travel") end
Waypoint.label: LocCheck5

Waypoint.action: if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("#038") end
Waypoint.label: LocCheck6

Waypoint.action: if (countitems(MPId) < MPToLeave) or (countitems(HPId) < HPToLeave) or (cap() < CapToLeave) then gotolabel("LeaveStart) end if FLOOR == "-1" then gotolabel("#45) end
Waypoint.label: Check

Waypoint.action: if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("LeaveStart") end
Waypoint.label: LocCheck

Waypoint.action: if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("USE") end
local position = Position:new(posx()+1, posy(), posz()) usedoor(position, "open") move("e")
Waypoint.label: OPEN3

Waypoint.action: local position = Position:new(posx(), posy()+1, posz()) usedoor(position, "open")
Waypoint.label: OPEN4

Waypoint.action: reachnpc("Captain Fearless") wait(500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_SAY, "hi") waitping() talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "ankrahmun") waitping() talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "yes") waitping()
Waypoint.label: TOANKRAHMUN

Waypoint.action: if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("#070") end

Script.content: auto(120000) local position = getitempositionfromcontainers(3725) useobject(position, 3725, position.z, 0)

auto(4000) local creatures = getcreatures() for _, c in ipairs(creatures) do if c.type == CREATURE_TYPE_MONSTER and math.floor(c.dist) <= 6 and (c.name == "pirat bombardier" or c.name == "pirat scoundrel") and not cooldown(237) and mp() > 100 then talk(1, "Exeta Amp Res") wait(200) if cooldown(237) then wait(2000) end end end
auto(200,800) if not ishasted() and cancast("utani hur") and not ispzone() then cast("utani hur") end

TargetRule.Name: Pirat Mate, Pirat Cutthroat, Pirat Bombardier, Pirat Scoundrel
